r.s: Numerical Root-Finding methods package in PHP
r.d: Math_Numerical_RootFinding is the package provide various number of Numerical Root-Finding Methods functions implemented in PHP. Supported methods: 1. Bisection/Binary Chopping/Interval Halving/Bolzano 2. False Position/Regula Falsi 3. Fixed Point 4. Netwon-Raphson 5. Netwon-Raphson 2 6. Ralston-Rabinowitz 7. Secant
r.n: * Request #2897: added new parameter $guess to validateEqFunction() * Added unit tests * Examples files renamed to lower case
